segments.text: Hello , Madam . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I'd like to send 600 RIB in cash to my daughter . How long will it take for her to receive the money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very quick and easy . It just takes 24 hours , we guarantee that . All you need to do is fill in this slip and we can proceed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are there any extra charges , like commission ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a service commission that you must pay . It's 1 % of the funds to be remitted , so you should pay an extra 6 RIB .
segments.speaker: S1
